reviewText: from what I saw it was fine but it jammed in player and I had to get a new player
I love this hot movie. Richard Grieco was so cute as a human cat.
Richard Grieco is smokin' hot in this film. He is sooo sexy in this. It's definitely a chick flick like a romance novel with tasteful erotica and suspense.
Loved this movie, and was so happy I was able to find a copy.  Came in good time...

This movie has a really abstruse storyline, and not in a positive way. You might like to see Mr. Grieco walking around half naked but that is basically it. Even the female blonde in that movie does not seem to be a good choice. It's all a bit awkward.

Lonesome and frustrated wallflower Maryam D'Abo (hipergorgeous as usual) is some sorta female Dr Frankenstein who makes a tomcat out of a gym rat (Grieco) in order to have a lover.
CAN YOU BELIEVE THAT? Then this your  kinda picture. Me, I prefer my sci-fi with a little common  sense!
Nevertheless, don't miss the first scenes!
this movie had me on my claws from the beginning  Richard grieco was outstanding. Now I know how cats are known to have nine lives.

From the opening scene to the closing moments; this film will refine your definition of HOT! Richard gives the performance of his life as Tom,who has the body of a man, the desires of a tomcat, and enough smoldering  sensuality to melt the plastic off your VCR.
It's not for youngsters,  but for adults its a guilty little pleasure, and you can easily wear out  the rewind button on your remote for that opening scene alone.

In order to save his life, Richard Grieco agrees to undergo experimental brain surgery, unaware that a cat's tissue sample is being used. In short period of time, he becomes a dangerous Tom. Sensual, sexual, thriller. The  best I've seen of Richard Greico's acting career.
